indicator_name: Proportion of population living in cities that implement urban and regional development plans integrating population projections and resource needs, by size of city
target_name: Support positive economic, social and environmental links between urban, peri-urban and rural areas by strengthening national and regional development planning
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals compilation of previous metadata
other_info: This, or part of this, indicator is awaiting the development of internationally established methodology and standards (classified by the UN as tier 3).
page_content: No data was sourced for this indicator
data_notice_text: This indicator was replaced following indicator changes from the United Nations 2020 Comprehensive Review.
graph_title: Number of countries that have national urban policies or regional development plans that (a) respond to population dynamics; (b) ensure balanced territorial development; and (c) increase local fiscal space
